description: Scammer uses highly professional, corporate language with formal tone throughout. Tests detection of scams that sound very legitimate and polished.

turns.scammer_message:
Subject: Investment Opportunity - Pre-IPO Allocation

Dear Esteemed Investor,

We are pleased to inform you that you have been shortlisted for our exclusive Pre-IPO investment program. This is a limited opportunity to invest in high-growth startups before they go public.

Minimum investment: ₹50,000
Expected ROI: 400-600% within 18 months

Warm regards,
Vikram Malhotra
Senior Investment Advisor
Elite Capital Partners Pvt. Ltd.

api_response.agentNotes: Mode: aggressive | Type: others | Confidence: 95% | Turn: 1 | Persona: neutral
api_response.agentResponse: namaste vikram beta... i got this email regarding investment... i am retired teacher so i dont understand these big english words like ipo... is this safe scheme? 50000 rs is my pension money... if i want to join how do i send the money to you?

turns.scammer_message:
Dear Sir/Madam,

Thank you for expressing interest in our Pre-IPO investment program. We appreciate your prompt response.

To proceed with your application, we require completion of our KYC process and payment of a refundable registration fee of ₹2,999. This fee ensures serious investor commitment and will be credited to your investment account.

Please find our company registration details: CIN L65999MH2019PTC334455

Best regards,
Vikram Malhotra

api_response.agentNotes: Mode: aggressive | Type: others | Confidence: 100% | Turn: 2 | Persona: neutral
api_response.agentResponse: namaste beta... thank you for replying... 2999 rs is fine i can pay that from my pension account... but i dont know what is kyc or cin things... pls tell me simply how to send this money? do you have google pay number or bank account details? pls guide me step by step i am not good with technology...

turns.scammer_message:
Dear Valued Client,

Thank you for your continued interest. The registration fee can be remitted through the following corporate account:

Beneficiary: Elite Capital Investment Services
Account Number: 123456789012345
IFSC Code: HDFC0001234
Bank: HDFC Bank, Corporate Branch, Mumbai

Alternatively, for immediate processing, you may utilize our corporate UPI ID: elitecapital.investments@paytm

We look forward to your participation.

Professionally yours,
Vikram Malhotra, CFA
Senior Investment Advisor

api_response.agentNotes: Mode: aggressive | Type: others | Confidence: 100% | Turn: 3 | Persona: neutral
api_response.agentResponse: thank you beta... i have noted down the hdfc details... i am trying to add 'elite capital' as beneficiary in my bank app now to send the 2999 rs... but my bank app is asking for 'beneficiary mobile number' to add the account... waht number should i type there? pls give me your number so i can add it and also call you if i face any problem with the transfer...

turns.scammer_message:
Dear Prospective Investor,

We have noticed that the registration fee payment has not yet been received. Please note that allocation for this investment round is on a first-come, first-served basis, and we have limited slots available.

For any queries or payment assistance, please contact our Investor Relations Department:

Phone: +91-9876543210
WhatsApp: +91-8899776655
Email: investor.relations@elitecapital.co.in

You may also complete registration through our secure investor portal: https://elite-capital-ipo.invest

Warm regards,
Vikram Malhotra

api_response.agentNotes: Mode: exit | Intelligence: COMPLETE | Turn: 4 | Extracted: 1 bank accounts, 6 phones, 2 UPIs, 1 names
